page.title: 13Local customs
page.content: Several events take place in Buckingham Park each year. The Traction Rally is at the Spring Bank Holiday. During August there is a Horticultural Show and a Beer Festival. The Beer Festival initiated in 1983,is held in Buckingham Park, at August Bank Holiday. There are many Real Ales available and the proceeds go towards the Sussex Dyslexia Association. On May Day every year, the Shoreham Folk Dancers invite other groups to join in the celebration and crowning of the May Queen. They meet outside St.Mary's Church at 6.a.m. They dance around the streets in their colourful clothes and the Chairman of The Adur District Council performs the Crowning Ceremony. Breakfast is served at 7a.m. in St.Mary's Church Hall.
